Contributor: Bemrose & Sons, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Poster No. 70." Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that men are needed to enlist and employers could do things to encourage their men to enlist. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 70.

Title: 3 questions to employers
